THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
2470 NORTH STAR ROAD
COLUMBUS 21, OHIO
Kichakd B. Hull, Executive Director
May 8, 1961
G. Harley
President, NAEB
1346 Connecticut Ave.
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
Please note enclosed photostat of letter from Secretary Ribicoff to
members of the Media Panel (See attached panel membership listing)
Only change: Governor Collins, for possible conflict of interest
reasons, withdrew when he assumed his NAB role. Lei and Hazard may
refuse a reappointment on the same basis which caused him to resign
(as did all the rest) from the previous committee, eg. unless the
Secretary makes the appointment of members, the committee has no
prestige. Ribicoff's letter represents a compromise between what
the committee or the panel asked and HEW protocal which insists
that McMurrin make the appointment.
Next meeting set for June 9-10 in Washington.
Si neerely
Richard B. Hull
Executive Director
